long_description: Outdoorsy women will enjoy the versatility of the Patagonia Vosque 3-in-1 parka. The waterproof shell and the warm, insulated zip-out liner parka can be worn separately or together. Waterproof, breathable nylon/polyester shell features a Durable Water Repellent finish to bead up rain. Adjustable hood snaps on and off; tall, zip-through stand-up collar lies flat when unsnapped. Shell featuers zippered handwarmer pockets; darts and yoke details offer a contoured fit. Stylish zip-out liner parka offers princess seams and horizontal quilt lines that increase in width from shoulders to hem, creating a modern silhouette. Zip-out liner parka is insulated with warm, 100% polyester (90% recycled) insulation and offers handwarmer pockets with hidden zippers. Adjustable cuffs have 2-position snaps. Patagonia Vosque 3-in-1 parka for women features a slim, above-the-knee length for excellent weather protection.
short_description: Outdoorsy women will enjoy the versatility of the Patagonia Vosque 3-in-1 parka. The waterproof shell and the warm, insulated zip-out liner parka can be worn separately or together.
